title: Schedule property showing
description: Coordinate showing for Sarah Johnson at Oak Street property. She's available weekday evenings or weekends.

title: Follow up on inspection results
description: Contact Michael Chen about inspection report findings and discuss any repair negotiations needed.

title: Prepare market analysis
description: Create comparative market analysis for Jennifer Davis property to determine optimal listing price.

title: Submit purchase agreement
description: Finalize and submit Emily Rodriguez's purchase agreement for the Maple Avenue condo.

title: Order title insurance
description: Contact title company to order title insurance for the Pine Road property closing.

title: Update property photos
description: Schedule professional photography for newly listed properties to improve online presence.

title: Send closing documents
description: Email final closing documents to Robert Kim for review before settlement date.

title: Check mortgage pre-approval
description: Verify Sarah Johnson's mortgage pre-approval status and follow up with lender if needed.
